resources.string: Please, Enter the total number of subjects you want to conflict free for advising.
Please, Input name of the subjects you want to conflict free.
Send us your feedback about this application if you have any suggestion and if you face any problem. Feel free to feedback us. Your opinion will help us to make this application better.
Update course database & advising list. This update needs at the beginning of the Advising and after application update.
EwuHub is an unofficial companion app for the students of EWU
Advising Helper & Advising List will help you to find the combination of sections of the courses without any conflict between section
Academic Calendar will help you to find the important dates in the semester
Using Notice Board you will be up to date with what is happening on the University
Some of the important feature of EWUSpirit will on your hand when you needed. EWUSpirit feature will be only accessible when you connected with \'ewuwifi\'
We hope you will have an excellent journey in your University Life.
Update the Academic Calendar. This is needed for beginning of the semester.
Update the advising list for advising.
Without connecting to the ewuwifi you can not access any of the services. This means you can only access to this service if you are on East West University.
Swipe right from the left edge of your mobile screen to see the options.
Not every feature of Ewu Spirit work, but the options given here is still functional.
Instructions To Use Ewu Spirit on Mobile
Here you can evaluate your instructors of every course you have taken. It\'s very helpful because most of the time ICS Lab PC is busy when you need this.
You can check when will be your class, what is the room number etc.
You can check if there any available seat of a particular section you want to take. This feature will be very helpful in advising day and for add droping course.
You can check how many credit you completed. What is your current cgpa etc. This feature will not show the detail result.
You can check which faculty is your current adviser. Your adviser is your guardian in the university.
Here you can see which time you can advising on advising day. Remember this time is very important, you should not late to go your adviser on advising day.
Advising Sheet will help you to see all the courses and its section, class start and end time, lab time, room number of the class

All the functionality of the ewuspirit is from original ewuspirit website. If original ewuspirit functionality changes then ewuspirit functionality on this App will also change. treebricks will not take any kind of responsibility of the use of ewuspirit.

treebricks is an application studio build by EWU students. EwuHub is treebricks first application. We worked a long time to bring this application before you. treebricks hope users will love this application.

EwuHub does not obtain any kind of personal information from your device and also when you use this application. The only information we get about you(Device Model, Android Version) is from google, when you downloaded this app from Google Play Store. To know how google collect your information goto Play Store Privacy Policy to know details about Google Play Store Privacy Policy. EwuSpirit server(On East West University) has some certain feature which allow anyone to get anyone\'s information like credit information, result, class routine etc. EwuHub and treebricks is not responsible for such kind information because EwuHub\'s information is based on East West University website and its server. User are responsible what they are doing with this Application.

treebricks is very happy bring this application to main stream. This can not be done without the help of many people. First we like to thank our sir K.M. Imtiaz Ud-Din for his advice and inspiration. Without his inspiration this application can not here today. We also grateful to our friends who also help us to improve our algorithm for the application. We also grateful to our beta and alpha tester who advice us how we can better this application. Thanks to our friend Riajul Islam from Ritz Photography who provide us such beautiful photograph of East West University. Thanks to our friends who helped us to update the database. Without them we could not bring the update of the database so quickly. We are also very grateful who are using this application. Don\'t bother to feedback about this application. This is for you. With your help we can make this application even better..

All the information of EwuHub is taken from www.ewubd.edu and it is the private property of East West University. They have all rights to change any information when they want. EwuSpirit is private server of East West University. User have to take any kind of responsibilities for using EwuSpirit. The privacy policy of EwuSpirit is not will not applicable on EwuHub. Users are advised to read the privacy policy of EwuHub.
